entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 07:45 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Rain at times mixed with wet snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 07:45 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Light snow inland in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland.
